definition.zh_def: 阿里（Ali）是一個常見的名字，通常用於男性，尤其在阿拉伯文化中。它也可以指代阿里巴巴集團，一家中國的電子商務公司。
definition.en_def: Ali is a common male name, especially in Arabic culture. It can also refer to Alibaba Group, a Chinese e-commerce company.
definition.example: Ali is planning to start his own business next year.
